Items.Title: Oversight - Examination and Discussion of NYC Department of Environmental Protection’s Comments, Entitled “Geophysical Evaluation of Infrastructure Risks of Natural Gas Production on New York City West of Hudson Water Supply Infrastructure,” to the NYS Department of Environmental Conservation (DEC) Regarding DEC’s Revised Draft Supplemental Generic Environmental Impact Statement on the Oil, Gas and Solution Mining Regulatory Program.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Examination and Discussion of NYC Department of Environmental Protection’s Comments, Entitled “Geophysical Evaluation of Infrastructure Risks of Natural Gas Production on New York City West of Hudson Water Supply Infrastructure.”
